meanings: a special product of the locality
know the geography of the place

meanings.meaning: You can't get there from here.

vlive.korean: [아이돌이 된 청포도 혹시... 그곳에서도 우리와 함께...?] [The green grape that became an idol... Perhaps with us at that place too?] View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 전생 체험하다가 죽음을 경험한 로켓펀치 연희 #아이돌 #리얼리티 ┃로켓펀치 [펀치타임
vlive.english: [The green grape that became an idol... Perhaps with us at that place too?]

vlive.korean: [똑똑][여기가 젠가 고수들만 있다는 그곳인가요?] 한 바퀴 더 남았어? [Smart [Is this where all the Jenga masters are?] There's one more round? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: [Smart [Is this where all the Jenga masters are?] There's one more round?

vlive.korean: [패기 넘침] 여기가 그곳인가! [Passionate] Is this here! 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.27 세봉이의 상상은 현실이 된다 #1
[그렇게 착지하면 소중한 그곳이!] [Oh no, that's got to hurt!] View video GOT7 : GOT7(갓세븐) TOURLOG EP.18
여기는 바로 아미피디아가 열렸던 그곳! - 그곳! This is where we had the ARMYPEDIA. - That place! 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.86
vlive.english: This is where we had the ARMYPEDIA. - That place!

examples.korean: In the spring the place is crowded with skiers. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 봄이 되면 그 곳은 스키어들로 붐빈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: In the spring the place is crowded with skiers. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The place was overlaid with memories of his childhood. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 곳에는 그의 어린 시절 추억들이 어려 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The place was overlaid with memories of his childhood. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It was a light spacious apartment at the top of the building. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그곳은 건물 맨 위에 있는 밝고 널찍한 아파트였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: It’s a long way away. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그곳은 멀리 떨어져 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’s a long way away. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: My grandparents emigrated to Canada to try their luck there. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리 조부모님은 그곳에서 자신들의 운수를 시험해 보기 위해 캐나다로 이민을 가셨다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
